newsitem.title: USA: Micro Warehouse restating financial results.
newsitem.headline: Micro Warehouse restating financial results.

text.p: Micro Warehouse Inc said Monday it is likely to restate its financial results for its 1994 and 1995 fiscal years after finding errors in accounting procedures.
The company said it hasn't determined the charge from these errors but believes it will total about $18 million after tax.
The company said it doesn't expect an effect on its ongoing operations.
The company said it believes the errors accumulated over several years and mainly involve years before 1996.
The company said it has formed a task force to examine the issue, and its audit committee is working with independent auditors KPMG Peat Marwick LLP and counsel Jones, Day, Reavis & Pogue.
